id.description: The id used to identify the addressbook on the instance

name.description: The display name of the addressbook which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The id used to identify the contact on the instance

name.description: The display name of the contact which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The id used to identify the announcement on the instance

name.description: The announcement subject which should be used in the visual representation

link.description: The full URL to the file

id.description: The id used to identify the calendar on the instance

name.description: The display name of the calendar which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The id used to identify the event on the instance

name.description: The display name of the event which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The id used to identify the file on the instance

name.description: The file name which should be used in the visual representation

path.description: The full path of the file for the user

link.description: The full URL to the file

id.description: The id used to identify the federated share on the instance

name.description: The name of the shared item which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The id used to identify the systemtag on the instance

name.description: The display name of the systemtag which should be used in the visual representation

visibility.description: If the user can see the systemtag

assignable.description: If the user can assign the systemtag

id.description: The id used to identify the user on the instance

name.description: The display name of the user which should be used in the visual representation

server.description: The URL of the instance the user lives on

id.description: The id used to identify the group on the instance

name.description: The display name of the group which should be used in the visual representation

id.description: The mail-address used to identify the event on the instance

name.description: The display name of a matching contact or the email (fallback) which should be used in the visual representation
